subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Beaten by Maria Riesch in the previous two downhills on the course at Lake Louise, Alberta, Lindsey Vonn struck back to win the World Cup super-G on Sunday.
snippet: Beaten by Maria Riesch in the previous two downhills on the course at Lake Louise, Alberta, Lindsey Vonn struck back to win the World Cup super-G on Sunday.
